short_summary: Request for Proposal: Occupational Health Professional Services
description: Thecontracting party requires services from a professional in occupational health to provide health assessments, evaluations, and management of work-related health issues. These services include but are not limited to: occupational health examinations, fitness for work assessments, pre-employment assessments, return-to-work services, neuropsychological assessments, vocational assessments, and disability services management. Across Canada, with work being conducted in Alberta only, the services required are those of an occupational health professional for the following specialties: occupational health (general practitioner, occupational health nurse, nurse practitioner), neuropsychology (neuropsychologist), psychiatry (psychiatrist), psychology (psychologist), and vocational evaluations (psychologists or certified vocational evaluators).

### **Notice Description** - **Description de l'avis**

The Canada Energy Regulator (CER) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide professional services for Occupational Health, including the following specializations:

*   General Practitioner
*   Occupational Health Nurse
*   Nurse Practitioner
*   Neuropsychologist
*   Psychiatrist
*   Psychologist
*   Certified Vocational Evaluators

These services will be required to:

*   Conduct occupational health examinations to implement and monitor modified work arrangements
*   Perform fitness for work assessments and return-to-work services
*   Conduct neuropsychological assessments
*   Provide vocational evaluations
*   Manage disability services
